summary:
Launch campaign - Adshares is the only full blockchain ecosystem for AdTech. Instant, secure and transparent P2P payments, ad settlement and decentralized ad networks - all over Blockchain. Like RTB and SWIFT combined - saving time, money and energy.

 Blockchain payment protocol - Adshares is the open-source solution based on simplifying. Scaled to serve all ad microtransactions in the world. 1,4 million transfers per second makes it the lightest, fastest & greenest solution.
